paper_meta.Paper_title: Rapid Direct Nucleic Acid Amplification Test without RNA Extraction for SARS-CoV-2 Using a Portable PCR Thermocycler.

protocols.Paper_title: Rapid Direct Nucleic Acid Amplification Test without RNA Extraction for SARS-CoV-2 Using a Portable PCR Thermocycler
Methods: other:use of PCR inhibitor-tolerant/enhanced one-step RT-qPCR mastermix enabling direct amplification from crude sputum/nasal exudate without RNA extraction (DIRECT-PCR; lysis/reverse transcription/amplification in a single-tube homogeneous reaction per Abstract; Pages 1–3)

protocols.Paper_title: Rapid Direct Nucleic Acid Amplification Test without RNA Extraction for SARS-CoV-2 Using a Portable PCR Thermocycler
Methods: other:direct RT-qPCR (single-tube) from crude respiratory matrices using inhibitor-resistant enzymes/reagents; no RNA purification
